channel.title: Need help making NPC have teleport menu
channel.description:
Been looking around forever but no threads or help about this. [b]I want to create a NPC on my 508 Server that can teleport you to multiply locations.[/b] To be clear meaning a NPC that when u click him he will have different teleporting places in the chat box.
Please post your help.
